name: What-ever Happened to Ruth MacArthur?
summary:
'What-ever Happened to Ruth MacArthur' is an interactive narrative experience where you are in search of a missing woman who left leaving only a trail of audiotapes behind her.
Explore a richly detailed, hand crafted environment, and experience the suspenseful narrative.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: What-ever Happened to Ruth MacArthur? : Trailer
